title: test2Probability and expected...
content:
test2Probability and expected value
[概率与期望值]
The thinking model of probability and expected value is the foundation of all rational decision-making—it brings clarity and logic to how we view risk, reward, and choice.
[概率与期望值这个思维模型是所有理性决策的底层框架，它让我们在面对风险、收益和选择时更加清晰和理性。]

sentences.text: The thinking model of probability and expected value is the foundation of all rational decision-making—it brings clarity and logic to how we view risk, reward, and choice.
概率与期望值这个思维模型是所有理性决策的底层框架，它让我们在面对风险、收益和选择时更加清晰和理性。
